name.baseName: Logging engineering ; Natural gas hydrate ; Saturation logging method
测井工程 ; 天然气水合物 ; 饱和度测井法

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Based on the analysis of experimental data of hydrate resistivity and the general relationship between resistivity and oil (gas) saturation, the optimum formula for calculating hydrate saturation is derived, and the physical meanings of three items in the formula are defined, which respectively represent the increase rate of resistivity when hydrate particles are completely distributed in the pores of formation rocks, supported by particles and existed in layers, and the corresponding quantitative evaluation method of hydrate saturation is established
通过水合物电阻率实验数据分析，从电阻率-含油（气）饱和度关系一般形式出发，导出适合水合物饱和度计算的最佳简式，明确了简式中 3 项的物理意义，即分别代表水合物颗粒完全分布于地层岩石孔隙中、以颗粒方式支撑和以成层状存在时的电阻增大率，建立了相应的水合物饱和度定量评价方法

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The author proposed for the first time

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The percentage of heterogeneous anisotropic pore volume is put forward. When the hydrate saturation increases from small to small, the experimental law of the measured resistivity changes is generally shown in the figure, that is, the resistivity increases monotonously with the increase of hydrate saturation in double logarithmic coordinates
提出了非均匀各向孔隙体积中所占的百分比。当水合物饱和度由小增大时，其电阻率测量值变化的实验规律一般如图所示， 即在双对数坐标下随着水合物饱和度增高呈单调递增形态
technology.technologicalApplicability: The saturation logging method described is used for the quantitative evaluation of hydrate saturation in natural gas hydrate exploration within geological formations, specifically in the South China Sea region. The method involves analyzing resistivity measurements to calculate the percentage of natural gas hydrates within porous rock formations. This process is crucial for determining the scale of natural gas reserves and can be applied during well-logging phases to assess potential extraction volumes.
所述饱和度测井方法用于南海区域天然气水合物勘探中地层水合物饱和度的定量评估。该方法涉及分析电阻率测量数据，以计算多孔岩石地层中天然气水合物的百分比。这一过程对于确定天然气储量的规模至关重要，并可在测井阶段应用，以评估潜在的提取量。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Comparing several different truncated forms of the general form of resistance increase rate-oil (gas) saturation given above, it can be seen that equation (5) is the result of taking two terms from the right denominator of the general form, that is, Indonesia formula is a special case of the general form saturation equation with high shale content
对比前文给出的电阻增大率-含油（气）饱和度一般形式的几种不同截短形式，可以看出式（5）为一般形式右侧分母中取两项的结果，即印度尼西亚公式是一般形式在泥质含量较高时饱和度方程的特例

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Oil and gas saturation, which is the percentage of oil and gas in pore volume, directly determines the scale of oil and gas reserves and is one of the core parameters of logging evaluation.
含油气饱和度即油气占孔隙体积的百分比，直接决定油气储量规模，是测井评价的核心参数之一。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: After the core is completely saturated with formation water, it is driven by oil and gas under pressure, and the increase rate of resistance increases with the increase of oil and gas saturation. The actual interpretation and evaluation of saturation is its inverse process, that is, the saturation is calculated according to the increase rate of formation resistance obtained from logging
岩心被完全饱和地层水后加压用油气驱替，电阻增大率随油气饱和度增加而增大。实际解释评价饱和度是其反过程，即依据测井得到的地层电阻增大率来计算饱和度

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 李宁;孙文杰;李心童;冯周;武宏亮;王克文; 天然气水合物饱和度测井解释模型及方程. 石油勘探与开发 1073–1079 (2022).
李宁;孙文杰;李心童;冯周;武宏亮;王克文; 天然气水合物饱和度测井解释模型及方程. 石油勘探与开发 1073–1079 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using the data set for assessing natural gas hydrate saturation, it is important to note that the derived formulas and saturation calculations are based on specific conditions such as rock porosity, hydrate distribution, and the presence of oil and gas within the pores. Users must consider the geological context and ensure that the experimental conditions used to derive the resistivity-saturation relationship are applicable to their assessment scenario. Careful interpretation of resistivity logs in line with the given methodology is required, and users should be aware of the implications of heterogeneous anisotropic pore volumes on the resistivity measurements.
在使用数据集评估天然气水合物饱和度时，需注意所得公式和饱和度计算是基于特定条件（如岩石孔隙度、水合物分布以及油气在孔隙中的存在）得出的。用户必须考虑地质背景，并确保用于推导电阻率-饱和度关系的实验条件适用于其评估场景。需要按照给定的方法仔细解释电阻率测井结果，并且用户应意识到非均匀各向孔隙体积对电阻率测量结果的影响。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The corresponding hydrate reserve when the saturation differs by 10%
饱和度相差10%时对应的水合物储量
